commentary-item-root d-flex-row align-start justify-start "><i class="jsx-3405591355 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 icon-mood icon-positive-comment text-24 mr12"></i><div class="jsx-3405591355 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-3405591355 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Higher than Industry Revenue Growth</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">A higher-than-industry revenue growth represents increased potential for the company to increase their market share</div><p class="jsx-3405591355 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 lh-138 text-13 text-secondary typography-body-regular-m commentary-desc">Over the last 5 years, revenue has grown at a yearly rate of 5.65%, vs industry avg of 4.67%</p></div></div><div tag="normal" eventlabel="Clicked Financial Statement" class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 commentary-item-root d-flex-row align-start justify-start "><i class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 icon-mood icon-positive-comment text-24 mr12"></i><div class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Increasing Market Share</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">Market share is the percentage of an industry&#x27;s total sales going to a particular company. It gives a general idea of the size of a company v/s its competitors</div><p class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 lh-138 text-13 text-secondary typography-body-regular-m commentary-desc">Over the last 5 years, market share increased from 20.03% to 20.82%</p></div></div><div tag="normal" eventlabel="Clicked Financial Statement" class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 commentary-item-root d-flex-row align-start justify-start "><i class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 icon-mood icon-positive-comment text-24 mr12"></i><div class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Higher than Industry Net Income</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">Net income is equal to net earnings (profit) less expenses. This number is an important measure of how profitable the company is</div><p class="jsx-1655783646 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 lh-138 text-13 text-secondary typography-body-regular-m commentary-desc">Over the last 5 years, net income has grown at a yearly rate of 6.48%, vs industry avg of -3.06%</p></div></div></div><div class="jsx-2510798477 mobile-screensplit-view"><div Further, SafeGold has appointed an independent trustee who has the authority to act on your behalf and to protect your interests. The trustee also verifies the quantity and purity of gold. Vistra Corporate Services has been appointed as Security Trustee by SafeGold. Vistra has the first and exclusive charge over your gold held in vaults which means it has a charge over the gold over other commercial creditors till the time of fulfillment of delivery to you.
